snippet: Half of all capital raised for private equity buyouts in 2013 went to the biggest funds, according to data released on Friday by Preqin, a research firm based in London. It was the first time since 2008 that megafunds have commanded half the market.
abstract: Half of all capital raised for private equity buyouts in 2013 went to the biggest funds, according to data released on Friday by Preqin, a research firm based in London. It was the first time since 2008 that megafunds have commanded half the market.

headline.main: Money Flows to the Biggest Buyout Funds
